product.name: iPhone 16
product.description: Experience the future of mobile technology with the all-new iPhone 16. Designed for power, performance, and style, this stunning Blue variant blends sleek aesthetics with cutting-edge innovation. With an advanced chipset, enhanced camera system, and immersive display, the iPhone 16 ensures smooth multitasking, vibrant visuals, and crystal-clear photos and videos. Whether you're capturing memories or managing your day-to-day tasks, the iPhone 16 delivers it all with elegance and speed.
